title: Tom Riley (rugby union)
text:
Tom Riley (born 4 May 1985 in Graig, <a href="Pontypridd">Pontypridd</a>, <a href="Wales">Wales</a>) is a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays at <a href="Centre%20%28rugby%20union%29">centre</a> for the <a href="Cornish%20Pirates">Cornish Pirates</a>.
Riley previously played for <a href="Pontypridd%20RFC">Pontypridd RFC</a>, <a href="Cardiff%20Blues">Cardiff Blues</a>, <a href="Newport%20RFC">Newport RFC</a> and <a href="Dragons%20%28rugby%20union%29">Newport Gwent Dragons</a>, and has played for Wales at <a href="Wales%20national%20under-18%20rugby%20union%20team">U18</a>, U19 and U21 levels. Riley made his debut for Newport Gwent Dragons against Ulster on 6 September 2009. He signed an extended contract with Newport Gwent Dragons in January 2010. He was released by Newport Gwent Dragons at the end of the 2011–12 season and signed for the Cornish Pirates in June 2012.
